summary: Argonian CBBE Skin Texture replacer with tattoos
descriptionHtml:
Name: Argonian CBBE plus Tattoo
Version: 1.0
Date: 11-26-2012
Category: Models and textures
Requirements: Skyrim
Author: Edhildils and IDzeroNo



==========
Description
==========
Argonian CBBE Skin Texture replacer with tattoos
[youtube]NcIVTdviaEs[/youtube]
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]

Unzip then copy/paste into your "skyrim" folder(without the quotes).
this should add the following files:

argonianfemalebody.dds
argonianfemalebody_msn.dds
argonianfemalebody_s.dds

into this folderpath:

Data\textures\actors\character\argonianfemale

[img]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/9233/uninstall.png[/img]

Delete these files:

argonianfemalebody.dds
argonianfemalebody_msn.dds
argonianfemalebody_s.dds

==========
Change Log
==========
1.0 - Initial release. Replaces them with these version.

==========
Credits and thanks
==========
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.

==========
Contact
==========
You can send me an email here

==========
Licensing/Legal
==========
You can do whatever you want with this mod.

==========
author: IDzeroNo
